message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $14000. What do you think?

Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the value you place on the product. However, I am looking to keep my investment within a certain budget. Would you be willing to consider $13500 for the product?

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Bob. I can see that you really want this product. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. I can offer it to you for $14250. What do you think?
I understand your position, Alice. I'm still committed to finding a price that fits my budget while being fair to you. Would you consider $14000 for the product?
I can see you're serious about getting this product, Bob. I'm willing to compromise a bit more, but I still need to make a profit. I can offer it to you for $14300. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. I'm still aiming to keep my expenses within my budget. Would you be open to selling the product for $14200?
I can see you're really close to your budget, Bob. I'm willing to make one final compromise. I can offer it to you for $14350. This is as low as I can go. What do you think?
I appreciate your efforts to accommodate my budget, Alice. Considering your last offer, I would like to propose $14300 for the product.
I've given you a fair deal, Bob. I'm not willing to go any lower. I can see you're really interested in the product, so I'm willing to meet you at $14400. This is my final offer. What do you think?
